entry.title: Fastest-possible PoW via Simple DAG
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around a notable [bitcointalk post](https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=98314.msg1075701msg1075701) which garnered attention and was subsequently referenced in the academic paper on [NC-Max](https://eprint.iacr.org/2020/1101.pdf). This indicates the significance of the forum's contribution to broader discussions and research in the field. The referencing of a forum post in a scholarly article highlights the interconnection between community-driven discussions and academic research, showcasing the practical implications and contributions such discussions can have on formal studies and advancements in the domain.
